entry.title: DATA AVAILABILITY via @ethereum Data availability is the guarantee that the block proposer published all transaction data for a block and that the tra...
entry.summary: DATA AVAILABILITY via @ethereum Data availability is the guarantee that the block proposer published all transaction data for a block and that the transaction data is available to other network participants. https://ethereum.org/nb/developers/docs/data-availability/
